archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: GitHub Enterprise
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
GitHub Enterprise is a self-hosted version of GitHub, which provides an environment for source code management and collaborative software development. It's geared towards larger organizations with more complex security, compliance, and deployment needs.
GitHub Enterprise includes the same core set of features as GitHub.com but adds features like enhanced security with SAML or LDAP support, more granular permissions, and a fully featured API for integrations. It can be deployed on-premises or in a private cloud. Organizations use it to host, review, and collaborate on code, while integrating with other tools and processes to manage the entire software development lifecycle.
